Class FileArchiverNotifierFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.FileArchiverNotifierFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileArchiverNotifierFactory
@Private public final class FileArchiverNotifierFactoryImpl extends Object implements FileArchiverNotifierFactory
A factory for getting instances of FileArchiverNotifier.
